title: Buttigieg and Family Leave
sub_head: An implicit rebuttal of government mandates.
body:
U.S. Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg is ruining family leave mandates for everyone. For everyone on the left, that is. Just in time for a debate on President Joe Biden’s multitrillion-dollar bundle of federal commands, Mr. Buttigieg is providing a real-time rebuttal of one-size-fits-all government regulation.
“Can Pete Buttigieg have it all?,” was the headline on a Politico story last week from Alex Thompson and Tina Sfondeles. They wrote that Mr. Buttigieg “has been MIA” and reported:
